subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored a season-high 38 points and J.R. Smith hit five 3-pointers in the Denver Nuggets’ 121-101 rout of the visiting Indiana Pacers last night.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored a season-high 38 points and J.R. Smith hit five 3-pointers in the Denver Nuggets’ 121-101 rout of the visiting Indiana Pacers last night.
